definitions.definition: The proof prepared in offset printing, with all elements positioned on the page.

definitions.example: We cannot repro the bug in the latest version, so we are marking it as fixed.

definitions.definition: The act of reproducing new individuals biologically.

definitions.example: Unauthorized reproduction of this article is prohibited.

definitions.definition: A copy of something, as in a piece of art; a duplicate.
definitions.example: Jim was proud of the Rembrandt reproduction he owned.

definitions.definition: The reproduction, reprinting and copying of graphics, especially using electromechanical or photographic methods
